name: Bike Simulator
description:
Submission for the Secret Santa Jam 2022. Letter mentioned platformer and bicycles.

Controls:

Mouse Right: Draw
Mouse Left: Navigate
Mouse Middle: Reset Camera
Mouse Wheel: Zoom Camera
Space: Start/Stop Simulation
Ctrl+Z: Undo

Achievements:

First Contact established:
Bicycle touches the ground

Longest run achieved:
Bicycle keeps on the ground for a certain distance

Backwards run achieved
Bicycle keeps goes backwards and stays on the g round for a certain distance

Longest fall achieved:
Bicycle falls for a certain time

Flip achieved:
Bicycle does a flip

Backflip achieved:
Bicycle does a back flip
